caption: Table 1: Parameter configurations for different types of initializations for the histogram task. Optimizer parameters as in the accompanying code. Average over 10 runs using the same dataset.
description: This table shows the results of different initialization methods for training a model on the histogram task.  It compares positional and semantic initializations using the Adam and SGD optimizers. The table presents the accuracy achieved by each initialization, along with the Euclidean distance between the initial and final weights, providing insight into the convergence behavior of different training approaches.
section: A The Histogram Task: An algorithmic toy example with a positional and semantic solution
